text: @JoshuaPotash Dr. Oz is a quack.  The schools are NOT closed to protect the kids.  They are closed to protect the ADULTS who are vulnerable to getting diseases from kids, especially small kids, because they are disease vectors.  COVID-19 is not common among kids but they can carry it.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
